EmailTemplate.textOnly: Reminder: Please share your feedback by Monday, March 22 Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Valued Customer}}, As our valued customer of the NCR Interactive Teller solution, we want to hear from you. Your feedback will tell us how we impact your business and where we can improve our product offerings to better support your needs. Please click on the link below to start the survey. {{lead.survey url:default=edit me}} Your feedback is tremendously important to us. We know time is one of the most valuable assets and we appreciate you dedicating a few minutes to take our survey. You still have two weeks to complete the survey since it closes on Monday, March 22. As always, thank you for being an NCR customer.
